title: NSA chief: no orders to counter Russia cyber threat
text:
NSA chief: no orders to counter Russia cyber threat 2:20am GMT - 01:48 
The head of U.S. Cyber Command told lawmakers on Tuesday that he'd received no additional authority or instruction from the White House to combat Russian cyber attacks similar to those Moscow is alleged to have used to sway the 2016 presidential election.   
The head of U.S. Cyber Command told lawmakers on Tuesday that he'd received no additional authority or instruction from the White House to combat Russian cyber attacks similar to those Moscow is alleged to have used to sway the 2016 presidential election.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/02/28/nsa-chief-no-orders-to-counter-russia-cy?videoId=404821831&videoChannel=13422
